pageTitle: Patch 4.0.6 on live realms this week
textBeforeTable: Dwarf Artifacts Tol'vir Vrykul Nerubian Orc Draenei Troll Night Elf Fossil Dwarf Survey has a 3 sec cooldown now, down from 5 sec. Also, Patch 4.0.6 changes the price of all the Archaeology junk items and makes the profession slightly more profitable. You won't make thousand of golds every hour but at least it won't feel like you're completely wasting your time! Archaeology Artifacts Price Changes Flask of Steelskin - Volatile Life x 8, Cinderbloom x 8, Twilight Jasmine x 8, Crystal Vial Flask of Flowing Water - Volatile Life x 8, Stormvine x 8, Heartblossom x 8, Crystal Vial Flask of the Draconic Mind - Volatile Life x 8, Azshara\\'s Veil x 8, Twilight Jasmine x 8, Crystal Vial Flask of the Winds - Volatile Life x 8, Azshara\\'s Veil x 8, Whiptail x 8, Crystal Vial Flask of Titanic Strength - Volatile Life x 8, Cinderbloom x 8, Whiptail
